text: "Next to Me" is a 2018 song by American pop rock band Imagine Dragons and is the fourth single from their third studio album Evolve (2017). It went to number 1 in Belgium, number 3 in the Netherlands and New Zealand, number 17 in the Czech Republic, number 21 in Italy, number 23 in France, number 36 in Slovakia and number 51 in Switzerland. Category:2018 songs Category:Imagine Dragons songs Category:Indie rock songs Category:Folk rock songs
title: Next to Me (Imagine Dragons song)
